Bob Haugen wrote:
> 
> And, even if you think you are, http://xkcd.com/386/
>

Yes, very funny, but there's also a saying, "pick your battles" and
this is the only one I'm engaged in.  Obviously, I consider it
important to evangelize on the issue, because I don't want to see REST
subsumed by an increasingly prevalent and irrational insistence that
using unregistered, unstandardized types on the Web is somehow
congruous with the style.

-Eric
